# Год 2010

Предподготовка
```{r}
#dat_10 %>% glimpse()

wd_10 <- dat_10
names(wd_10) <- c("case","gndr","live","age","gest","LB","WB","brn","hrt","lung","liver","spln","kid","thym","adr","panc","plac","mac","CM","MP","IUGR","HC","CC","wht")

#СТРАННОСТЬ!!!
#table(wd_10$wht)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(CC = ifelse(is.na(wht) == T & case != 387 , CC, wht), wht = NULL)
####  

#table(wd_10$case)
#table(wd_10$gndr)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(gndr = ifelse(gndr == "ж", "f" , "m"))

#table(wd_10$live)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(live %in% c("мертв","мертвый","мёртвый"), 0 , live)) %>%
  mutate(live = ifelse(age == 0,"still","live"))

#table(wd_10$age)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(age == "живой", NA , age))

#table(wd_10$gest)
#table(wd_10$mac)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(mac = ifelse(mac == "да", 1 , 0))

#table(wd_10$CM)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(CM = CM %>% replace_na("no"))

#table(wd_10$MP)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(MP = MP %>% replace_na("no")) %>% mutate(MP = ifelse(MP == "да","yes","no")) 

#table(wd_10$IUGR)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(IUGR =  IUGR %>% as.character() %>% replace_na("no"))

#Добавляю год
wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(year =  2010)


wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(across(c(case, gest, LB, WB,brn, hrt,lung,liver,spln, kid, thym, adr, panc, plac, HC, CC), ~ as.numeric(.x)), across(c(gndr, live, mac, MP), ~ as.factor(.x)))

#wd_10 %>% glimpse()

```

Фильтрация
```{r }
wd_10 <- wd_10 %>%
  filter (is.na(case) == FALSE) %>% #без протокола
  filter(gndr %in% c("m","f")) #без пола

#сей???
table(wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub(",", ".", wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub("лет", "г", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("года", "г", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("госа", "г", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("г", "year", wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub("час", "ч", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("чов", "ч", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("ча", "ч", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("ч", "hour", wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub("минут", "мин", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мин.", "мин", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("'", "мин", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мин", "minute", wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub("месяца", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("месяцев", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("месяц", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мяцев", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мяца", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мев", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мес", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("мяц", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("ма", "ме", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("ме", "month", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("м", "month", wd_10$age)

wd_10$age <- gsub("суток", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("сутки", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("дней", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("сут", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("ски", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("дня", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("сей", "д", wd_10$age) #!!!!
wd_10$age <- gsub("дей", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("дн", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("с", "д", wd_10$age)
wd_10$age <- gsub("д", "day", wd_10$age)


wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(Age = ifelse(live == "live",duration(wd_10$age), 0))
wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(Age_1 = strsplit(as.character(Age), 's')) %>%
  mutate(Age_1 = sapply(Age_1, head, 1)) 
wd_10 <- wd_10 %>%  add_column(age_d = as.numeric(wd_10$Age_1), .after = 4)
wd_10$age_d <- round(wd_10$age_d/86400,4)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% mutate(Age = NULL, Age_1 = NULL) %>%
  filter(age_d <= 1)

wd_10 <- wd_10 %>% filter (gest >= 14) %>%  #гестация < 14
  filter (mac == 0) %>% #мацерация
  filter (CM == "no") %>% #врождённые пороки
  filter (MP == "no") %>% #многоплодная
  filter (IUGR == "no") #СЗРП
```
411

# Год 2011

Предподготовка
```{r}
#dat_11 %>% glimpse()

wd_11 <- dat_11
names(wd_11) <- c("case","gndr","live","age","gest","LB","WB","brn","hrt","lung","liver","spln","kid","thym","adr","panc","plac","mac","CM","MP","IUGR","HC","CC")

#table(wd_11$case)
#table(wd_11$gndr)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(gndr = ifelse(gndr == "ж", "f" , "m"))

#table(wd_11$live)

#ед сердцебиен???

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(live %in% c("мертв","мертвый","мёртвый","мёритвый","интранатальная гибель плода"), 0 , age)) %>%
  mutate(age = ifelse(is.na(age) == T, live, age)) %>%
  mutate(live = ifelse(live %in% c("мертв","мертвый","мёртвый","мёритвый","интранатальная гибель плода"),"still","live"))

#table(wd_11$age)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(age %in% c("живой", "живший","жив", "живш"), NA , age))

#table(wd_11$gest)
#table(wd_11$mac)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(mac = ifelse(mac == "да", 1 , 0))

#table(wd_11$CM)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(CM = CM %>% replace_na("no"), CM = ifelse(CM == "нет", "no",CM))

#table(wd_11$MP)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(MP = MP %>% replace_na("no")) %>% mutate(MP = ifelse(MP == "да","yes","no")) 

#table(wd_11$IUGR)

wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(IUGR =  IUGR %>% as.character() %>% replace_na("no"))

#Добавляю год
wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(year =  2011)


wd_11 <- wd_11 %>% mutate(across(c(case, gest, LB, WB,brn, hrt,lung,liver,spln, kid, thym, adr, panc, plac, HC, CC), ~ as.numeric(.x)), across(c(gndr, live, mac, MP), ~ as.factor(.x)))

#wd_11 %>% glimpse()

```

# Год 2012

Предподготовка
```{r}
#dat_12 %>% glimpse()

wd_12 <- dat_12
names(wd_12) <- c("case","gndr","live","age","gest","LB","WB","brn","hrt","lung","liver","spln","kid","thym","adr","panc","plac","mac","CM","MP","IUGR","HC","CC")

#table(wd_12$case)
#table(wd_12$gndr)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(gndr = case_when(gndr == "ж" ~ "f",
                                           gndr == "м" ~ "m"), gndr = ifelse(gndr %in% c("f","m"),gndr, NA))

#table(wd_12$live)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(live %in% c("мертв","мертвый","мёртвый","мёритвый","интранатальная гибель плода"), 0 , age)) %>%
  mutate(age = ifelse(is.na(age) == T, live, age)) %>%
  mutate(live = ifelse(live %in% c("мертв","мертвый","мёртвый","мёритвый"),"still","live"))

#table(wd_12$age)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(age = ifelse(age %in% c("живой", "живший","жив", "живш"), NA , age))

#table(wd_12$gest)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(gest = ifelse(gest == "?", NA , gest))

#table(wd_12$mac)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(mac = ifelse(mac == "да", 1 , 0))

#table(wd_12$CM)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(CM = CM %>% replace_na("no"), CM = ifelse(CM == "нет", "no",CM))

#table(wd_12$MP)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(MP = MP %>% replace_na("no")) %>% mutate(MP = ifelse(MP == "да","yes","no")) 

#table(wd_12$IUGR)

wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(IUGR =  IUGR %>% as.character() %>% replace_na("no"))

#Добавляю год
wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(year =  2012)


wd_12 <- wd_12 %>% mutate(across(c(case, gest, LB, WB,brn, hrt,lung,liver,spln, kid, thym, adr, panc, plac, HC, CC), ~ as.numeric(.x)), across(c(gndr, live, mac, MP), ~ as.factor(.x)))

#wd_12 %>% glimpse()

```
